casebody.data:
John R. PEARSON, Executor, v. SECRETARY OF THE INTERIOR et al. No. 1829. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Jan. 9, 1939. Frank T. McCoy, of Pawhuska, Old., for appellant. Whit Y. Mauzy, U. S. Atty., of Tulsa, Okl., and Sam S. Canterbury, of Tulsa, Old., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and WILLIAMS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellee, Secretary of the Interior.
